name: Find the Silvers FPS
description:
Find the Silvers FPS!

To connect to someone, find their external ip using a website like https://whatismyip.com and input it in the address field

Make sure to allow the game through your firewall!

If Hosting - On windows, run FTS FPS.console.exe. On Linux, run FTS FPS.sh

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Click - Find Silver

R - Respawn (if stuck)
